## Repository type

Represents a Repository: a context for BluePrinting.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Repository = SystemWideObject & {
    AccessControlList?: AccessControlList;
    BusinessProcessType?: Link;
    ContentSecurityDescriptor?: SecurityDescriptor;
    DefaultMultimediaSchema?: Link;
    HasChildren?: boolean;
    Key?: string;
    LocationInfo?: LocationInfo;
    Metadata?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    MetadataSchema?: Link;
    MinimalLocalizeApprovalStatus?: Link;
    Parents?: Array<Link>;
    RootFolder?: Link;
    TaskProcess?: Link;
    VersionInfo?: LimitedVersionInfo;
};
```
